course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Music and Dance
course.description: The combination of music and dance has been explored as an art form throughout time. This interdisciplinary course aims to study the close relationship between music and dance from a historical, choreographic and compositional viewpoint. It will explore the wide range of styles and genres that have been developed over time, through a close study of the similarities between dance and music, and how they can be used to work as one.
